archimate:BusinessObject.name: DeviceBridgingProtocolDetails
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"This association defines the set of BridgingProtocols that are currently being used on this LogicalDevice. The supportsProtocol aggregation is used to determine if a particular Protocol (not just a BridgingProtocol) is supported by this LogicalDevice.
The particular semantics of this association are defined by the DeviceBridgingProtocolDetails association class. "
